house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1977 has 2 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) , 2 car garage. Rooms include master bedroom. Features include patio, storage space.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Bar, Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Ceiling Fan(s),Dining/Living Combo, Dishwasher, Garage Door Opener, Great Room,Storage Space
